item.title: Postsyntax
item.description: Inline Code This is Inline Code Only pre Code block with backticks <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <title>Example HTML5 Document</title> <meta name="description" content="Sample article showcasing basic Markdown syntax and formatting for HTML elements." /> </head> <body> <p>Test</p> </body> </html> Code block with backticks and language specified <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8" /> <title>Example HTML5 Document</title> <meta name="description" content="Sample article showcasing basic Markdown syntax and formatting for HTML elements.
